unnormalised: ## Automotive News: EV Charging Scene Heating Up!
normalised: ## Automotive News: Electric Vehicle Charging Scene Heating Up!

unnormalised: Folks, the electric vehicle revolution is picking up speed faster than a souped-up Maruti 800 on the Mumbai-Pune Expressway! And guess what's driving it (pun intended)? Yep, EV charging infrastructure!
normalised: Folks, the electric vehicle revolution is picking up speed faster than a souped-up Maruti eight hundred on the Mumbai-Pune Expressway! And guess what's driving it (pun intended)? Yep, electric vehicle charging infrastructure!

unnormalised: Talk about convenience! Indian Oil is reportedly planning to roll out even more charging stations across their petrol pumps. Think chai and samosas while your Tata Nexon gets juiced up. A proper desi recharge!
normalised: Talk about convenience! Indian Oil is reportedly planning to roll out even more charging stations across their petrol pumps. Think chai and samosas while your Tata Nexon gets juiced up. A proper desi recharge!

unnormalised: And it's not just petrol pumps. IIT Delhi is working on developing faster and more efficient charging technologies, hoping to bring charging times down to mere minutes. Think of it like a quick "Om Shanti Om" interval during a Bollywood film, and you’re back on the road!
normalised: And it's not just petrol pumps. I I T Delhi is working on developing faster and more efficient charging technologies, hoping to bring charging times down to mere minutes. Think of it like a quick "Om Shanti Om" interval during a Bollywood film, and you’re back on the road!

unnormalised: Tata Power has also announced a major expansion, promising charging stations every few km on major highways. No more range anxiety nightmares for folks planning that long drive to Manali!
normalised: Tata Power has also announced a major expansion, promising charging stations every few kilometer on major highways. No more range anxiety nightmares for folks planning that long drive to Manali!

unnormalised: With charging costs estimated around Rs. 8-10 per unit, running an EV is becoming seriously economical, especially compared to those skyrocketing petrol prices. Electric dreams, anyone?
normalised: With charging costs estimated around rupee eight to ten per unit, running an electric vehicle is becoming seriously economical, especially compared to those skyrocketing petrol prices. Electric dreams, anyone?
